ygData.subject: Money
ygData.msgSnippet: It s so sad to see all these clerics bickering over petty wealth. When I was L15 I was wearing patchwork and using a summoned hammer. As long as I had the
ygData.messageBody:
It's so sad to see all these clerics bickering over petty wealth.
When I was L15 I was wearing patchwork and using a summoned hammer.
As long as I had the money to buy spells I was happy (did have to
borrow some from my friends). I am L50 now and have never had over
2000p in the bank (only have 500p in there now) and I still wear 2
pieces of bronze (gloves and cloak). I think the important thing is
to have fun and do what you like (hates camping and farming items).
Don't worry about what others have. If you have good friends and good
groups items will come in time. Besides, what's to look forward to if
you have everything you need by the time you reach L20?

Drogo DarkBane
L50 Halfling Cleric
The Rathe
